description: Technical or administrative violation with minimal impact on PHI or compliance
Violation not directly resulting in unauthorized PHI access or disclosure
Violation creating risk of unauthorized access disclosure or misuse of PHI
Violation involving unauthorized access disclosure or use of PHI or failure to notify
Willful violation involving unauthorized PHI access disclosure or sale of PHI, or failure to remedy after notice
Reckless disregard for HIPAA requirements resulting in significant risk to PHI
Willful neglect of HIPAA requirements that is not cured within specified timeframe
Pattern or practice of violation demonstrating systematic non-compliance
penalty_range: Escalated civil penalties and potential criminal penalties

description: Violation affecting multiple individuals or multiple breach types
penalty_range: Penalties calculated per violation multiplied by number of affected individuals

description: Total penalties assessed for all violations identified within calendar year
penalty_range: $1,000-$1,500,000 or more annual maximum depending on violation category
